strings:
<voice_0x010017CB><se_low>Chen Mui: Now listen to me carefully, <leader>.
I cannot approach the Lord of the Dragovians in his present state, lest he drain my own strength away.

<voice_0x010017CC><se_low>Chen Mui: Thus, I cannot accompany you to the Dais.
But I'll be fighting alongside you in spirit.

<voice_0x010017CD><se_low>Chen Mui: I believe in you, <leader>.
I know you can bring the Lord of the Dragovians back to his senses.
